Database_Description: An anonymised random sample of 1% of people from the 2011 Census for England and Wales, including both usual residents and short-term residents.
Database_Description_Welsh: Sampl ddienw ar hap o 1% o bobl o Gyfrifiad 2011 ar gyfer Cymru a Lloegr, gan gynnwys preswylwyr arferol a thrigolion tymor byr.
